data.what_is:
Altcraft Platform is an omnichannel Marketing Platform distributed as a private cloud or on-premise software.
 
- On-premise deployment allows to customize the software to fit exact business needs. 
- Cloud offers an account with tariffs based on the number of customer profiles.

FEATURES

Digital customer profiles:
- Full history of actions
- Multiple resource subscriptions
- Location & device information
- CRM & SQL data integration
- Customer profile 360 analytics

 Marketing  automation:
- Customer journey
- A/B/n Testing Tools
- Content personalization
- Static & dynamic segmentation
- Web & messaging events tracking
- Transactional messaging
- Easy, powerful drag-n-drop email builder& HTML editor

Communications via all digital channels:
- Messengers
- SMS marketing
- Rich Push constructor for Mobile and Web 
- Banners, social & custom channels
- Email via built-in AKMTA sender
- Popular SMS gateways integration
- Forms for collecting information and conducting quizzes

Real-time analytics:
- Cohort analysis
- Audience growth report
- Interactive conversion funnels
- Summary report for all channels
- Pixel goals achievement
- Email click tracking
- LTV studies

With Altcraft Platform your business will obtain total data security, conversion and customers' lifetime value increase. Detailed analytics will help you organize effective planning while various automatization options will optimize your employees' working process.
data.product_description: Altcraft is an analytic email-marketing platform created for the automation of email communications.

initial_reviews.review_title: Altcraft- Pre-Scheduled Email Campaigns With Dynamic Content
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Altcraft?
*	It is a secure all-in-one marketing automation platform for eCommerce businesses.
*	Connect the digital channels of the internet and track the ROI of Our email campaigns.
*	Create Personalized Mailings, drip campaigns, and target business customers online.
*	Advanced drag-and-drop email designers make it easy to create content for campaigns.
*	Manage subscriber lists and automate email marketing workflow easily.
*	Easy to use, Best cloud based email marketing & autoresponders.

What do you dislike about Altcraft?
No alternative platform was found like Altcraft. Need more functionality to create better campaigns. The server of Altcraft is very fast.

Recommendations to others considering Altcraft:
We should use a marketing automation platform for our business growth. Altcraft helps to move our business forward. Advanced features help to grow campaigns and engage subscribers and deliver the right message to the right people at the right time.

What problems is Altcraft solving and how is that benefiting you?
Altcraft is beneficial for our business to create Personalized mailing campaigns. We can make it easy and automatic, lists and drip multiple campaigns to different segments instantly. No data entry required to store all of our contacts in our next email campaign. It provides advanced functionality to create campaigns like Drag-and-Drop email builder, and sophisticated analytics help to develop automated, personalized email campaigns that deliver more leads and revenue than traditional outbound or inbound tactics. It is next generation marketing automation software to increase business sales.

initial_reviews.review_title: Automated marketing solution for online sales
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Altcraft?
The dashboard allows us to connect our channel group manager with it - so we can have a automated controlling unit of the current marketing campaigns. The software is used online for the marketing and advertising campaigns. This works perfectly and it is possible to adjust the main dashboard easily.

What do you dislike about Altcraft?
Cost controlling doesn't work so good at all in the software - we have to set limits at the external company to be sure that the limit won't be skipped automatically.

What problems is Altcraft solving and how is that benefiting you?
Getting in touch with the customer by different marketing channels - we can adjust and stop campaigns directly from the platform - no single access to the connected manager platforms is needed anymore for that.
